metadata.title: CVE-2018-16790 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
_bson_iter_next_internal in bson-iter.c in libbson 1.12.0, as used inMongoDB mongo-c-driver and other products, has a heap-based bufferover-read via a crafted bson buffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16790` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbson-1.0-0 - 1.9.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libbson package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
